root: ^Good thing you're here! The last guy was awful.
^Leader Duck: As you may know, in this town, cake is VERY important.
^Hungry Duck: So that makes us also VERY important.
^We're about to become even more important.
^Close your beak! We're here to talk about delivery. Remember the script!
^Ahem. Since cake is SO important, we have lots of top-secret cake business. Can we trust you to keep it down?

c-0: ^Great. We believe you, completely. Therefore, this first delivery is not a test. Can you send this Ingredient Package to the Toad Gang?
^Paranoid Duck: I'm sure you've heard of Toad's reputation. So, please, show us you can be delicate around him.
^We won't wish you luck, because it won't help you!

First_Toad_Meet: ^Finally! You're here! We've  got 3 cakes out for delivery.
deliver_ingredients_firsttime: ^Big Boss is busy. You can leave it with us.

s: ^Here, I'll put it in your small hand.

deliver_ingredients_firsttime_conclusion: ^So you're not going to deliver our cakes? Disappointing.
^Bzz. (Here's the payment, loser. Bring it back to the ducks.)
ask_payment: ^Thats Ducks' business, not ours. Now, get out of here. We're busy.

Payment_To_Ducks: ^No, I didn't even talk to him.

plan_figured_out: ^I figured it out! I figured out our PLAN! (Quackles)
^Excellent work. But we can't talk about it HERE.
^Bind your beaks! We'll talk about this in private. Nerd Duck?
^Oh, right, Phase 1! Uhh, here you go.
tup_obtained: ^Take this TUPperware to Grandma Shrew. Ask her to follow the instructions inside.
^And, whatever you do, don't let the Toad Gang see you.

Tupperware_To_Gma: ^Oh, a delivery? For me? But I didn't order anything.
^This is from Duck Gang. (Give Grandma the TUPperware.)

speculation_with_Gma: ^Hmm, a note with instructions? How do I open this thing? "Do not let them see ..." Oh!
^Wait. But surely this must be from Toad Gang?
^No, this is definitely from the Ducks!
gma_follows_instructions: ^"Now do the rest in private ..." Hmm! These ducks sure are bossy. You stay right there.
^Let's see, what do I say now? "Go." Yes, tell them "go!"
^Hmmph. You kids are always getting me involved. This will lead to trouble!

Toad_Scorns_Ducks: ^So, this is the new delivery pig.
